short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts links and images from  PDF files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PDF Extractor Plugin to export all images and links from PDF documents.
Searching for a relevant & tested approach to extract images from PDF files? You can go with the PDF Extractor plugin. This plugin is developed to provide ease to the users for extracting hyperlinks and images from PDFs. User groups such as content creators and marketers, business professionals, web developers, trainers, etc. Can use this powerful plugin to bulk download links and images from PDF files.
Moreover, this plugin also comes in first place in terms of data security. As this PDF image extractor plugin never stores any user data on its server. Additionally, one prime functionality is that this plugin can work offline without having any active internet connection. Now let's discuss some of the exciting features if the PDF link and image extractor.
Key Functionalities of PDF Extractor Plugin
This addon can bulk extract images and hyperlinks from PDF documents.
Users can use this plugin without connecting to the internet.
Supports all types of PDF formats like PDF/A, PDF/E, PDF/X, etc.
The plugin also supports the downloading of individual images.
Another highlighting feature of this plugin is the user-friendly UI/UX.
How to Use the Best PDF Extractor Plugin?
Initially, click on the Add to Chrome button to install the PDF image extractor plugin.
Next, go to the extensions button from the top-right corner of the Chrome browser.
Then, find and click on the PDF Extractor plugin from the already installed extensions.
Simply insert the PDF into the plugin interface and click on the extract images and link button.
 Finally, to download bulk images and links click on the "Download All" button.
Technical Support: If you are facing any challenges while using the PDF extractor plugin. Our engineer's team is available to support you.
